about.headline: Who I Am
about.title: About me
about.intro: Hey there, I'm Phillip! With some information about yourself and experience, you can write about who you are and what is your source of inspiration for improving your programming skills.
about.location: Where are you based? Would you be open to working remotely or potentially relocating?
about.mindset: Show that you are open-minded. Are you enthusiastic about learning new technologies and continually improving your skills?
about.approach: A brief description of your problem-solving approach. Do you learn from each challenge as you search for the most efficient or elegant solution? You can include some keywords like: analytical thinking, creativity, persistence and collaboration.

skills.intro: A short introduction of your skills. Highlight your experience with different front-end technologies and emphasise your openness to learning and adapting to new technologies. Show how important it is for you to keep up with rapid changes in web development.
skills.contactMe: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

contact.encourageText: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contact.privacyText3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
contact.privacyError: You must agree to the privacy policy
contact.messageError: Please enter a message with min. 4 letters
contact.successMessage: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong while sending your message. Please try again later.
contact.disposableEmailError: Disposable email addresses are not allowed
contact.nameMissing: Oops! It seems your name is missing
contact.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
contact.messageRequired: What do you need to develop?

reviews.headline: What my colleagues say about me

testimonials.text: Phillip was a dedicated and reliable member of our Join project. He showed great interest in all parts of the application and often shared helpful ideas with the team. He worked independently, created well-structured solutions, and prepared complex setups that made development easier for everyone.

Phillip contributed extensively to both the backend and frontend development. He designed the database structure for multiple components and optimized key services such as the contact and task modules. On the frontend, he improved performance and styling for various UI elements, including buttons, toasts, and input fields. His strong technical expertise, reliability, and focus on quality made him a highly valuable teammate.

Phillip impressed with his deep knowledge of programming and made a significant contribution to the success of our project. Throughout our collaboration, he proved to be a committed and helpful team player who always contributed to achieving our common goals. Even in stressful phases, Phillip remained calm and organized, allowing him to drive the project forward in a focused manner and play a decisive role in shaping it.

projects.headline: Portfolio
projects.description: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

polloLoco.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.

daBubble.description: Slack-inspired chat application with real-time messaging, channels, and direct messages. Built with Angular and Firebase.

legal.title: Legal Notice

I may update or change the terms and conditions from time to time without notice.
legal.scope_ownership_title: Scope and ownership of the product
legal.scope_ownership_text1: This Portfolio has been developed as part of a web development project. It has an educational and professional showcase purpose. As such, I cannot guarantee consistent availability, reliability, accuracy, or any other aspect of quality regarding this Product.
legal.proprietary_rights_text: I retain all proprietary rights in this Portfolio, including any associated copyrighted material, trademarks, and other proprietary information.

In no event will I be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential or exemplary damages arising out of or in connection with the use or performance of this Portfolio.
legal.indemnity_text: You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless me and my affiliates from and against any claim, demand, loss, damage, cost, or liability arising out of or relating to your use of this Portfolio.
legal.contact_text: For any questions or notices, please contact me at phillips96.business@gmail.com.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Personal data (usually referred to just as 'data' below) will only be processed by us to the extent necessary and for the purpose of providing a functional and user-friendly website, including its contents, and the services offered there.
privacy.responsible_text: The responsible party for this website (the 'controller') for purposes of data protection law is:
privacy.rights_text: You have the following rights regarding your personal data:
privacy.right_access: Right of access to your personal data
privacy.right_rectification: Right to rectification or erasure of your personal data
privacy.collection_text: When you contact us via the contact form, we collect the data provided by you (name, email address, message content) for the purpose of processing your inquiry. This data will be stored until your inquiry has been fully processed and then deleted, unless there are legal retention obligations.
privacy.contact_text: If you have any questions about data protection, please contact me at phillips96.business@gmail.com.
